message.content:
Create a complete Next.js 14 dating app frontend in C:/Users/joshl/date-app/frontend. Include:
1. package.json with dependencies (next, react, tailwindcss, socket.io-client, axios, zustand, etc.)
2. tailwind.config.js and globals.css with modern dating app theme
3. app/ directory with pages for:
   - Landing/marketing page
   - Login/Register with validation
   - Profile creation/editing with photo upload
   - Discovery/swipe interface (Tinder-style cards)
   - Matches list
   - Chat interface with real-time messaging
   - Settings/preferences
4. components/ - reusable UI components (cards, buttons, modals, etc.)
5. hooks/ - custom hooks for auth, socket, api calls
6. stores/ - Zustand stores for state management
7. lib/ - API client, socket client, utilities

Make it mobile-first, responsive, and production-ready. Write all files.

input.description: Create directory structure for Next.js dating app

input.content:
{
  "name": "date-app-frontend",
  "version": "1.0.0",
  "private": true,
  "scripts": {
    "dev": "next dev",
    "build": "next build",
    "start": "next start",
    "lint": "next lint"
  },
  "dependencies": {
    "next": "14.2.0",
    "react": "^18.2.0",
    "react-dom": "^18.2.0",
    "axios": "^1.6.7",
    "socket.io-client": "^4.7.4",
    "zustand": "^4.5.1",
    "react-hook-form": "^7.50.1",
    "@hookform/resolvers": "^3.3.4",
    "zod": "^3.22.4",
    "framer-motion": "^11.0.8",
    "react-hot-toast": "^2.4.1",
    "date-fns": "^3.3.1",
    "clsx": "^2.1.0",
    "tailwind-merge": "^2.2.1",
    "lucide-react": "^0.344.0",
    "@headlessui/react": "^1.7.18",
    "react-spring": "^9.7.3",
    "use-gesture": "^0.0.0-use.8",
    "@use-gesture/react": "^10.3.0"
  },
  "devDependencies": {
    "@types/node": "^20.11.20",
    "@types/react": "^18.2.58",
    "@types/react-dom": "^18.2.19",
    "autoprefixer": "^10.4.17",
    "eslint": "^8.57.0",
    "eslint-config-next": "14.2.0",
    "postcss": "^8.4.35",
    "tailwindcss": "^3.4.1",
    "typescript": "^5.3.3"
  }
}

content.text: Let me verify the directory structure was created correctly.

input.description: List all created files in the frontend directory

content.text:
I have successfully created a complete Next.js 14 dating app frontend. Here is a summary of what was created:

## Complete Next.js 14 Dating App Frontend

**Location:** `C:/Users/joshl/date-app/frontend`

### Project Structure (66 files total)

#### Configuration Files
- `package.json` - Dependencies including Next.js 14, React 18, Tailwind CSS, socket.io-client, axios, zustand, framer-motion, react-hook-form, zod, and more
- `tailwind.config.js` - Custom theme with dating app colors (pink/rose gradient), animations (swipe, heart-beat, float), and custom utilities
- `postcss.config.js` - PostCSS configuration
- `tsconfig.json` - TypeScript configuration with path aliases
- `next.config.js` - Next.js configuration with image domains
- `.eslintrc.json` - ESLint configuration
- `.gitignore` - Git ignore patterns
- `.env.example` - Environment variables template

#### Global Styles (`app/globals.css`)
- Custom CSS variables for theming
- Component classes (buttons, inputs, cards, chat bubbles, swipe cards)
- Animations for swipe actions, typing indicators, and heart beats
- Mobile-first responsive utilities

#### Library (`lib/`)
- `api.ts` - Complete API client with axios, authentication, token management, and all endpoints (auth, users, discover, matches, messages)
- `socket.ts` - Socket.io client for real-time messaging and presence
- `utils.ts` - Utility functions (formatting, validation, constants)
- `validations.ts` - Zod schemas for form validation

#### State Management (`stores/`)
- `authStore.ts` - Authentication state with persist middleware
- `discoverStore.ts` - Profile discovery and swipe state
- `matchesStore.ts` - Matches and online status
- `chatStore.ts` - Real-time chat messages and typing indicators

#### Custom Hooks (`hooks/`)
- `useAuth.ts` - Authentication hook with auto-redirect
- `useSocket.ts` - Socket connection management
- `useSwipe.ts` - Swipe gesture handling with react-spring
- `useDebounce.ts` - Debounce and throttle utilities
- `useMediaQuery.ts` - Responsive breakpoint hooks
- `useGeolocation.ts` - Location access

#### UI Components (`components/ui/`)
- `Button.tsx` - Gradient buttons with loading states
- `Input.tsx` - Form inputs with icons and validation
- `Modal.tsx` - Accessible modal with Headless UI
- `Avatar.tsx` - User avatars with online indicator
- `Badge.tsx` - Status badges and notification counts
- `Card.tsx` - Card components with variants
- `Slider.tsx` - Range slider for preferences
- `Toggle.tsx` - Toggle switches
- `Tabs.tsx` - Tab navigation
- `Skeleton.tsx` - Loading skeletons

#### Feature Components (`components/features/`)
- `SwipeCard.tsx` - Tinder-style profile card with photo navigation
- `SwipeActions.tsx` - Like/Pass/Super Like action buttons
- `MatchCard.tsx` - Match list item with last message
- `ChatBubble.tsx` - Message bubbles with read receipts
- `ChatInput.tsx` - Message input with typing indicators
- `PhotoUpload.tsx` - Photo grid upload with reordering
- `InterestPicker.tsx` - Interest selection with search
- `MatchModal.tsx` - Match celebration animation
- `ProfileDetails.tsx` - Full profile view
- `BottomNav.tsx` - Mobile navigation with badges

#### Pages (`app/`)
- **Landing Page** (`page.tsx`) - Marketing page with hero, features, testimonials, and CTAs
- **Auth Pages** (`(auth)/`)
  - `login/page.tsx` - Email/password login with social options
  - `register/page.tsx` - Multi-step registration wizard
  - `forgot-password/page.tsx` - Password reset flow
  - `onboarding/page.tsx` - Profile setup after registration
- **Main App** (`(main)/`)
  - `layout.tsx` - Protected layout with bottom navigation
  - `discover/page.tsx` - Swipe interface with gesture support
  - `matches/page.tsx` - Match list with new matches section
  - `chat/[matchId]/page.tsx` - Real-time chat with typing indicators
  - `likes/page.tsx` - Likes received (premium feature)
  - `profile/page.tsx` - User profile view
  - `profile/edit/page.tsx` - Profile editing
  - `settings/page.tsx` - App settings with notifications
  - `settings/preferences/page.tsx` - Discovery preferences

### Key Features
- Mobile-first responsive design
- Tinder-style swipe gestures with animations
- Real-time messaging via Socket.io
- Form validation with react-hook-form and Zod
- State management with Zustand (persisted auth)
- TypeScript throughout
- Accessible modals with Headless UI
- Smooth animations with Framer Motion
- PWA-ready with manifest.json

### To Run
```bash
cd C:/Users/joshl/date-app/frontend
npm install
npm run dev
```

The app will be available at `http://localhost:3000`.
